price: Vuga uti “Nimumbwire ku by’amafunguro Allah yabamanuriye, maze amwe mukayaziririza andi mukayazirura!” Vuga uti “Ese Allah ni We wabibahereye uburenganzira, cyangwa mwahimbiye Allah ikinyoma?”
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ فَجَعَلۡتُم مِّنۡهُ حَرَامٗا وَحَلَٰلٗا قُلۡ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمۡۖ أَمۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum mā anzala al-lahu lakum min riz'qin fajaʿaltum min'hu ḥarāman waḥalālan qul āllahu adhina lakum am ʿalā al-lahi taftarūna
